atk-s0402a31:2_3: Tattha kira bhūtabalikaraṇatthaṁ baliṁ haranti, tasmā baliharaṇanti vuccati.
atk-s0402a31:2_6: Sampavāretīti alaṁ alanti vācāya ceva hatthavikārena ca paṭikkhipāpeti.
atk-s0402a31:2_7: Sādhu vata māyanti sādhu vata maṁ ayaṁ.
atk-s0402a31:2_11: Anissaraṇapaññoti chandarāgaṁ pahāya saṁkaḍḍhitvā paribhuñjanto nissaraṇapañño nāma hoti, ayaṁ na tādiso, sacchandarāgo paribhuñjatīti anissaraṇapañño.
atk-s0402a31:6_2: Tathāgato hi paṭhamabodhiyaṁ vīsati vassāni kadāci cāpāle cetiye, kadāci sārandade, kadāci bahuputte, kadāci gotamaketi evaṁ yebhuyyena devakulesuyeva vihāsi.
atk-s0402a31:6_3: Imasmiṁ pana kāle vesāliṁ upanissāya gotamakassa yakkhassa bhavanaṭṭhāne vihāsi.
atk-s0402a31:7_0: Idañca bhagavatā suttaṁ atthuppattiyaṁ vuttanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0402a31:7_4: Sambahulā kira brāhmaṇapabbajitā attanā uggahitabuddhavacanaṁ nissāya jānanamadaṁ uppādetvā dhammassavanaggaṁ na gacchanti –
atk-s0402a31:7_5: ‘‘sammāsambuddho kathento amhehi ñātameva kathessati, no aññāta’’nti.
atk-s0402a31:7_7: Satthā te bhikkhū pakkosāpetvā mukhapaṭiññaṁ gahetvā mūlapariyāyaṁ desesi.
atk-s0402a31:7_8: Te bhikkhū desanāya neva āgataṭṭhānaṁ, na gataṭṭhānaṁ addasaṁsu.
atk-s0402a31:7_9: Apassantā ‘‘sammāsambuddho ‘mayhaṁ kathā niyyātī’ti mukhasampattameva kathetī’’ti cintayiṁsu.
atk-s0402a31:7_10: Satthā tesaṁ manaṁ jānitvā imaṁ suttantaṁ ārabhi.
atk-s0402a31:8_0: Tattha abhiññāyāti ‘‘ime pañcakkhandhā, dvādasāyatanāni, aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo, bāvīsatindriyāni, cattāri saccāni, nava hetū, satta phassā, satta vedanā, satta cetanā, satta saññā, satta cittānī’’ti jānitvā paṭivijjhitvā paccakkhaṁ katvā, tathā –
atk-s0402a31:8_1: ‘‘ime cattāro satipaṭṭhānā’’tiādinā nayena te te dhamme jānitvā paṭivijjhitvā paccakkhameva katvāti attho.
atk-s0402a31:8_2: Sanidānanti sappaccayameva katvā kathemi, no appaccayaṁ.
atk-s0402a31:8_3: Sappāṭihāriyanti paccanīkapaṭiharaṇena sappāṭihāriyameva katvā kathemi, no appāṭihāriyaṁ.
atk-s0402a31:8_4: Alañca pana voti yuttañca pana tumhākaṁ.
atk-s0402a31:8_5: Tuṭṭhiyāti ‘‘sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākkhāto dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅgho’’ti tīṇi ratanāni guṇato anussarantānaṁ tumhākaṁ yuttameva tuṭṭhiṁ kātunti attho.
atk-s0402a31:9_2: Bodhisatte kira dakkhiṇadisābhāgena bodhimaṇḍaṁ abhiruḷhe dakkhiṇadisābhāgo heṭṭhā avīciṁ pāpuṇanto viya ahosi, uttarabhāgo uggantvā bhavaggaṁ abhihananto viya.
atk-s0402a31:9_3: Pacchimadisaṁ gate pacchimabhāgo heṭṭhā avīciṁ pāpuṇanto viya ahosi, pācīnabhāgo uggantvā bhavaggaṁ abhihananto viya.
atk-s0402a31:9_4: Uttaradisaṁ gate uttaradisābhāgo heṭṭhā avīciṁ pāpuṇanto viya, dakkhiṇadisābhāgo uggantvā bhavaggaṁ abhihananto viya.
atk-s0402a31:9_5: Pācīnadisaṁ gate pācīnadisābhāgo heṭṭhā avīciṁ pāpuṇanto viya, pacchimabhāgo uggantvā bhavaggaṁ abhihananto viya.
atk-s0402a31:9_6: Bodhirukkhopi sakiṁ heṭṭhā avīciṁ pāpuṇanto viya, sakiṁ uggantvā bhavaggaṁ abhihananto viya.
atk-s0402a31:9_7: Tasmimpi divase evaṁ chahi ākārehi cakkavāḷasahassī mahāpathavī akampittha.
atk-s0402a31:11_4: Ayaṁ kira bharaṇḍu kālāmo sakyānaṁ aggapiṇḍaṁ khādanto vicarati.
atk-s0402a31:11_5: Tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṁ sampattakāle ekā dhammadesanā samuṭṭhahissatīti ñatvā bhagavā evaṁ adhiṭṭhāsi, yathā añño āvasatho na paññāyittha.
atk-s0402a31:11_8: So kira āḷārakālāmakāle tasmiṁyeva assame ahosi, taṁ sandhāyevamāha.
atk-s0402a31:11_11: Kāmānaṁ pariññaṁ paññāpetīti ettha pariññā nāma samatikkamo, tasmā kāmānaṁ samatikkamaṁ paṭhamajjhānaṁ paññāpeti.
atk-s0402a31:11_12: Na rūpānaṁ pariññanti rūpānaṁ samatikkamabhūtaṁ arūpāvacarasamāpattiṁ na paññāpeti.
atk-s0402a31:11_13: Na vedanānaṁ pariññanti vedanānaṁ samatikkamaṁ nibbānaṁ na paññāpeti.
atk-s0402a31:13_1: Pañcame abhikkantāya rattiyāti ettha abhikkantasaddo khayasundarābhirūpaabbhanumodanādīsu dissati.
atk-s0402a31:13_2: Tattha ‘‘abhikkantā, bhante, ratti, nikkhanto paṭhamo yāmo, ciranisinno bhikkhusaṅgho, uddisatu, bhante, bhagavā bhikkhūnaṁ pātimokkha’’nti evamādīsu khaye dissati.
atk-s0402a31:13_3: ‘‘Ayaṁ imesaṁ catunnaṁ puggalānaṁ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā’’ti evamādīsu (a. ni.
atk-s0402a31:14_0: ‘‘Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṁ;
atk-s0402a31:15_0: Abhikkantena vaṇṇena, sabbā obhāsayaṁ disā’’ti. (vi. va. 857) –
atk-s0402a31:16_4: Tena abhikkantāya rattiyāti iṭṭhāya kantāya manāpāya rattiyāti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0402a31:16_5: Abhikkantavaṇṇāti idha abhikkantasaddo abhirūpe, vaṇṇasaddo pana chavithutikulavaggakāraṇasaṇṭhānapamāṇarūpāyatanādīsu dissati.
atk-s0402a31:16_6: Tattha ‘‘suvaṇṇavaṇṇosi bhagavā’’ti evamādīsu (ma. ni. 2.399; su. ni.
atk-s0402a31:16_8: ‘‘Kadā saññūḷhā pana te gahapati samaṇassa gotamassa vaṇṇā’’ti evamādīsu (ma. ni.
atk-s0402a31:16_12: ‘‘Atha kena nu vaṇṇena, gandhatthenoti vuccatī’’ti evamādīsu (saṁ. ni.
atk-s0402a31:16_20: Tena abhikkantavaṇṇāti abhirūpacchavi, iṭṭhavaṇṇā manāpavaṇṇāti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0402a31:17_3: ‘‘Kevalakappā ca aṅgamagadhā pahūtaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ ādāya upasaṅkamissantī’’ti evamādīsu (mahāva.
atk-s0402a31:17_9: ‘‘Āyasmato, bhante, anuruddhassa bāhiyo nāma saddhivihāriko kevalakappaṁ saṅghabhedāya ṭhito’’ti evamādīsu (a. ni.
atk-s0402a31:18_1: Tathā hissa ‘‘okappaniyametaṁ bhoto gotamassa, yathā taṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassā’’ti evamādīsu (ma. ni.
atk-s0402a31:18_3: ‘‘Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañcahi samaṇakappehi phalaṁ paribhuñjitu’’nti evamādīsu (cūḷava.
atk-s0402a31:18_19: Tasmā kevalakappaṁ jetavananti ettha anavasesaṁ samantato jetavananti attho.
atk-s0402a31:19_3: Oḷārikanti brahmadevatāya hi pathaviyaṁ patiṭṭhānakāle attabhāvo oḷāriko māpetuṁ vaṭṭati pathavī vā, tasmā evamāha.
atk-s0402a31:19_5: Nappavattino ahesunti sajjhāyamūḷhakā vācā parihīnāyeva ahesuṁ.
atk-s0402a31:22_1: Chaṭṭhe goyogapilakkhasminti gāvīnaṁ vikkayaṭṭhāne uṭṭhitapilakkhassa santike.
atk-s0402a31:23_5: Imasmiṁ sutte vaṭṭameva kathitaṁ, gāthāsu vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṁ kathitanti.
atk-s0402a31:25_1: Aṭṭhame idaṁ te mānasminti ayaṁ te navavidhena vaḍḍhitamānoti attho.
atk-s0402a31:25_2: Idaṁ te uddhaccasminti idaṁ tava uddhaccaṁ cittassa uddhatabhāvo.
atk-s0402a31:27_3: Vivaṭo virocatīti ettha ekato ubhato attato sabbatthakatoti catubbidhā vivaṭatā veditabbā.
atk-s0402a31:29_4: Gāḷhaṁ katvā pharusaṁ katvā vuccamānopīti attho.
